text: Montaigu is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, it became a part of the new commune Montaigu-Vendée.Arrêté préfectoral 20 April 2017 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Montaigu, Vendée
